statements: DELETE FROM market_data WHERE id = 5 AND stock_quantity < 50;
DELETE FROM market_data WHERE competitor_name = 'Company A' AND competitor_price > 100.00;
DELETE FROM ExternalMarketData WHERE data_source = 'Competition Analysis';
DELETE FROM MarketOpportunities WHERE category='Electronics' AND sales_volume > 1000
DELETE FROM ExternalMarketData WHERE market_trend='Positive' AND market_size < 50000
DELETE FROM ExternalMarketData WHERE source = 'Survey' AND data_type = 'Market Share';
